-- | A test framework provider for testing-feat
--   
--   A test provider for testing-feat copied from
--   test-framework-quickcheck2 by Max Bolingbroke
@package test-framework-testing-feat
@version 0.1.0.1


-- | Allows Feat properties to be used with the test-framework package.
--   
--   For an example of how to use test-framework, please see
--   <a>http://github.com/batterseapower/test-framework/raw/master/example/Test/Framework/Example.lhs</a>
module Test.Framework.Providers.Feat

-- | Create a <a>Test</a> for a Feat property
testFeat :: (Enumerable a, Show a) => TestName -> (a -> Bool) -> Test
instance Typeable Property
instance Eq PropertyStatus
instance Testlike PropertyTestCount PropertyStatus Property
instance Show PropertyStatus
instance TestResultlike PropertyTestCount PropertyStatus
